author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-APAC Resources ‍Expects HY Profit Attributable Of Not Less Than HK$400 Mln
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Apac Resources Ltd:
* ‍EXPECTED TO RECORD HY PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS OF NOT LESS THAN HK$400 MILLION​
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO ‍INCREASE IN PROFIT CONTRIBUTION FROM CORE BUSINESS SEGMENTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
